attributes.action: Keep Christmas as a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rumours are circulating that Christmas could be downgraded to a normal day to improve race relations. This is idiotic! we don't expect other religions to stop celebrating their public holidays so why should we? This petition is to show that the people do not want this & shouldn't even be thought of! there are other ways to improve race relations and scrapping our christmas - a family time, Is not the way to do it! so don't!

rejection.details: There are no such proposals. All rumours to that effect are false.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
